text: The women's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Olga Shulikova Kseniya Zadorina Yelena Novikova Lyudmila Litvinova ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Marie-Angélique Lacordelle Symphora Béhi Virginie Michanol Thélia Sigère ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Hanna Platitsyna Kseniya Karandyuk Yuliya Irhina Oleksandra Peycheva ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships – Women's 4 × 400 metres relay
